about_the_game:
The storyline begins with an otherworldly reincarnated person who is suddenly summoned to a continent after gaining a new consciousness...

The main character is a skeleton that can be assigned trait points.

It's up to you.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/two2.gif

These additional attributes are in addition to the original base attributes (mainly in combat scenarios)

Strength boosts physical attacks, Almighty boosts spell attacks, Durability boosts defense, and Luck represents Blitz.

Original sin is a very interesting setting, there will be npcs in the game towns, players if infected with infectious diseases (if you drink unclean water) and talk to npcs will have a chance to infect npcs, npcs will disappear after the disease, and it will take a certain amount of time to refresh, the original sin will be increased, and the value of this value affects the additional damage of the skeleton soldier attack. In addition, the original sin will be accumulated when defeating human enemies.

There is a stamina bar, which will be consumed while walking (you can replenish it by drinking water and potions), and when it gets too low, it will cause you to walk slowly.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/one1.gif

When a player dies for any reason, they will be thrown to the nearest resurrection point (usually the ground floor of the nearest town inn) and the game will not end.

When you enter a town, the current town is automatically set as the resurrection point.

There are a variety of female characters with different personalities and fighting styles that you can acquire through quests.

The game alternates between day and night, with questline NPCs and demons appearing at different times.

The main quest will be opened by a female NPC (press T to summon her at any time).

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/three3.gif

Skeletons can be given different skins through quests. Some of these skins have special effects, and can be used to take on special quests or quest lines for a certain power through the form.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/five5.gif

Each town will have a different nature. For example, newbie villages are controlled by the Church and you must wear a certain skin to enter them safely, while some trade towns are free to come and go as they please.

Battle System

You can use the QTE battle mode in the game (more difficult) you can also turn off the QTE battle mode to use the normal mode

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/battle1.gif

You can challenge the more difficult QTE battle mode.

This battle mode has keystroke prompts and unique battle effects during skill release.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/battleQte.gif

Lighting System

Allows you to adjust the color tones and floodlighting effects in the scene (press the B key on the keyboard to call out and close the light source settings menu)

Bow and Arrow System

Various types of bows and arrows have different properties and ways to get them, you can get them through magic item drops or synthesize them, each long-range attack will consume the number of bows and arrows, the choice of bow and arrows can be selected from the arrow menu or switched during the battle.

Weapons and defenses can be synthesized in the menu (you will need to obtain the necessary materials) and can be purchased in the store or obtained by defeating demons and completing related quests.

Weapons and defenses created by synthesis are more powerful!

Suture Monster System

Sealed magic items and human NPCs can be synthesized.

Each sealed monster will have a different talent and skill (you can view them in the menu “Magic Dish”, and if you don't like them, you can dismantle them to get rid of the materials).

There are some rare and special skills that only the sealed item can have.

There are four types of talents: positive benefits, negative abilities, double-edged swords, and rare and powerful lore.

There is a chance that more powerful creatures will be created to fight for you!

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/six6.gif

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 4-core | AMD RYZEN 3 or Intel core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: discrete graphics card 4-8G Graphics Memory | GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: 6-core or 8-core | AMD RYZEN 5 or Intel core i5 Or higher.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: discrete graphics card 8-16G Graphics Memory | GTX 2060 Or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: standalone sound card

short_description: Transmigrate from a distant time to an alien world, a horrifying undead creature, acquire human skin, blend into towns and cities, master demonic stunts and fight with your minions as the only way to survive. Expand your ranks and become the king of the world in a land full of crises!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
